scripts.publish: yarn run test && yarn run build && yarn workspace source run publish --out-dir $PWD/out/packages

hooks.pre-commit: cp README.md source/src/rocket-punch/README.md && git add source/src/rocket-punch/README.md && markdown-source-import "{,!(node_modules)/**/}*.md" --git-add && lerna run --concurrency 1 --stream precommit --since HEAD --exclude-dependents
